DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Visual Outcomes After Myopic LASIK

DOC.criteria: 18 year old Candidates bilateral LASIK Myopic range : 0.00 7.00 D Astigmatism : 0.00 5.00 D Pupil size great 8mm diameter , infrared measurement thin cornea ( preoperatively calculate minimal residual bed < 250 um ) irregular astigmatism asymmetric astigmatism unstable refraction criterion preclude patient undergo LASIK
